mapper.select: select h_img from hotel_img where ihotel = #{ihotel}
select hser.*, ser.s_nm from hotel_service hser left join service ser on hser.iservice = ser.iservice where hser.ihotel = #{ihotel};
select * from hotel_info where ihotel in (select ihotel from like_list where iuser = #{iuser});

SELECT A.h_capacity, A.h_location, A.address, A.h_price, A.mapX, A.mapY, A.h_preDetail, A.h_detail, A.h_tel, A.h_service, A.h_star, A.h_name B.h_img FROM hotel_info A LEFT JOIN hotel_img B ON A.ihotel = B.ihotel WHERE A.h_location = #{ h_location } ORDER BY A.ihotel
LIMIT #{ startIdx }, #{ recordCnt }
SELECT A.review_star, A.review_cnt, A.review_regdt, B.review_img FROM hotel_review A LEFT JOIN review_img B ON A.ireview = B.ireview
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel_review ( review_star, review_cnt ) VALUES ( #{review_star}, #{review_cnt} )
INSERT INTO review_img ( ireview, review_img ) VALUES ( #{ireview}, #{h_r_img} )
INSERT INTO hotel_info ( h_star ) VALUES ( SELECT AVG( review_star ) FROM hotel_review WHERE ireview = #{ ireview })
insert into hotel_info (h_name, h_detail, h_address, h_tel, h_capacity) value (#{h_name},#{h_detail},#{h_address},#{h_tel}, #{h_capacity})
